Im trying to setup Junit on linux(ubuntu 9.10).I folloed the inst=
ructions on junit.org site for donwloading and setup of junit.

tracted junit installer files to :/usr/bin/junit-3.8.2 directory
2.I have s=
etup the classpath as follows:
export CLASSPATH=3D$CLASSPATH:/user/bin/juni=
t-3.8.2/junit.jar

' test:

rsk@rsklaptop:/usr/bin/junit-3.8.2/junit/samples/money$ java junit=
